#summary suggestion: new simple logic for the ofs-jdbc expressions

== Introduction ==
{{{
SELECT 
	SENDOFS {{setIfNull ?1 TRUE}} CUSTOMER,UAB.CFI.CU.PI.AMN/I/PROCESS,${USER}/${PASS}/,
		TAX.ID:1:           = set ?2
		LAST.NAME:1:        = set ?3           
		FIRST.NAME:1:       = set ?4           
		MIDDLE.NAME:1:      = set ?5           
		DOC.TYPE:1:1        = const 1
		-POSTFORMATTING-
		//redefine incoming parameter
		?1 = decode ?cust.id NULL "" ?cust.id
		
	SENDOFS TRUE CUSTOMER,UAB.CFI.CU.PI.{{decode ?1 NULL INP AMN}}/I/PROCESS,${USER}/${PASS}/,{{decode ?1 NULL ""}}
		TAX.ID:1:           = set ?2
		LAST.NAME:1:        = set ?3           
		FIRST.NAME:1:       = set ?4           
		MIDDLE.NAME:1:      = set ?5           
		DOC.TYPE:1:1        = const 1
}}}

==Why we should do this if it's possible to doit in java?==
To implement a simple logic in WSO2 Data Services
